attributes.action: Ban foreign lorries, or they have to have blind spot mirrors!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I had an accident a week ago, where a spanish lorry just pulled into my lane on the A2, and wrote my car off. I am 18 years old, and that will affect my insurance for the rest of my teens. The spanish driver didnt seem to care, and just wanted to go! Something needs to be done!
